entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 11 May 2023
